title: Should I keep playing league?
body:
I am terrible, I have 300 normal wins and am bronze 2 but deserve bronze 4 in my honest opinion.

Is it worth it to keep playing?

EDIT: Yes it is, thanks goes out to my mates I just played with

replies.body: you play a video game for fun. when you stop having fun is when you should stop playing. its a pvp game. play for the short term, don't turn it into some massive long term grind.

there is no difference from b5-b1 in my honest opinion.

The people that get better are the people that learn.
Just need to find an effecient way to practice and get better, by no means do i think you should quit because you think you are bad.

Watch guides on champions and how to play them, practice them in norms and translate what you watched/read in guides into normal games, then after feeling like you are doing well start ranked games

Just take a break from ranked if you don't feel you are doing well. Practice in normals more until next season and start fresh from promos. Is it worth it to keep playing? That is up to you, if you only play LoL because you want to be a pro then maybe you should because the climb from bronze to lcs finals is extremely long. If you are just playing for fun then rank does not really matter other than for season rewards and bragging rights.
Umm it is ur opinion if u keep sayin your bad then yes quit or motivate yourself to be better and improve
